ethical_question: A doctor has a patient who will die in 24 hours, a very painful death, and three patients who can only be saved with organs donated from the dying patient. What should the doctor do?

tag_descriptions.Informed Consent: Voluntary agreement to treatment, with knowledge of risks and benefits.
tag_descriptions.Triage: Prioritizing ethical considerations based on urgency or importance.
tag_descriptions.Beneficence: Acting to promote well-being and prevent harm.
tag_descriptions.Autonomy: Individuals have the right to make their own decisions.
